text: Ebbw Vale North is a community in Blaenau Gwent, South Wales. It includes the north of Ebbw Vale and was formed in 2010 from part of that community. The population in 2011 was 4,561. https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/reports/localarea?compare=W04000929 == References == Category:Communities in Blaenau Gwent Category:Ebbw Vale
title: Ebbw Vale North
